chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 croaked religiously, "Chirp! Medicine time!" Every. Single. Night. Pip, a fluffy chick 🐥, usually chirped and gulped it down. But one night, Pip was too busy building a nest out of glitter ✨ and lost track of time. Ferdinand, frantic, found Pip snoring amidst the sparkles. He hopped onto Pip's head and screamed, "RIBBIT! 💊 NOW!" Pip, startled, swallowed the medicine whole. "Thanks, Ferdie," Pip mumbled, "Almost forgot!" 😴
